name: Sqaure Parkour
description:
If the game doesn't load in the browser and you are a mac or linux user go to this link to play!

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/802454 

Simple 2D game with a retro vibe, a game with 20 levels and each level is unique, like a dark level might be harder to complete than a brighter level, also don't fall in the lava!

This game is quite difficult to complete.....so try your best and also remember that only epic gamers can finish the game.

I took the theme "Free" by making the game free to play!

Thanks to AdhesiveWombat and Jeremy Blake for letting me use their music!

I also used the SuperMarioBros Theme Song by the Blue Game Classics

https://www.shazam.com/track/90250218/super-mario-bros-theme
